    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109501</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109501</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Path of a charged particle in a magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pfad eines belasteten Partikels in einem 
magnetischem fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voie d'accès d'une particule chargée dans un 
champ magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trajeto de uma partícula carregada em um campo 
magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percorso di una particella caricata in un campo 
magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονοπάτι ενός χρεωμένου μορίου σε ένα μαγνητικό 
πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Camino de una partícula cargada en un campo 
magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the curved path taken by a charged particle inside a magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charged particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">path</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß der gebogene 
Pfad, der durch einen belasteten Partikel innerhalb eines magnetischen
genommen wird, auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la voie d'accès 
incurvée prise par une particule chargée à l'intérieur d'un champ 
magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o trajeto curvado feito 
exame por uma partícula carregada dentro de um campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il percorso curvo 
preso da una particella caricata all'interno di un campo magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κυρτό μονοπάτι που 
λαμβάνεται από ένα χρεωμένο μόριο μέσα σε ένα μαγνητικό 
πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el camino curvado 
tomado por una partícula cargada dentro de un campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">belastete Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pfad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
